title: Update doc to mention changes in patching
body: Update that doc to mention that a patched .NET SDK is a normal output of the build now after changes in [bootstrap](https://github.com/dotnet/msbuild/blob/9c89563239bd60739920991211649d899b32ecb4/documentation/wiki/Bootstrap.md?plain=1): https://github.com/dotnet/msbuild/blob/main/documentation/Deploy-MSBuild.md
